events.name: Registration
events.subtitle: ✨ Check-in & Badge Pickup
events.description: 🏷️ Pick up your event badge, grab some swag, and get ready to hack!

events.name: Dinner
events.subtitle: 🍔 Welcome Feast
events.description: 🍽️ Enjoy delicious food while mingling with fellow participants.

events.name: Opening Ceremony
events.subtitle: 🎉 Official Kickoff
events.description: 🎤 The event begins! Hear from inspiring speakers and get pumped!

events.name: Career Fair
events.subtitle: 💼 Meet Industry Pros
events.description: 🤝 Connect with recruiters and explore awesome career opportunities.

events.name: Team Formation
events.subtitle: 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Find Your Dream Team
events.description: 📝 Join a team or form your own to work on your hackathon project!

events.name: Fire Noodle Challenge
events.subtitle: 🔥Spice Up the Night!

events.name: Bracelet Making + Jackbox
events.subtitle: ✨ Craft, Trade, and Play!
events.description: 🎲 Come make/trade charm bracelets and play party games together!

events.name: Hacking Begins
events.subtitle: 👩‍💻 Let the Coding Begin!
events.description: 💻 It's time to start building your masterpiece!
